info.title: Sela Monty API
info.description: API documentation for the Sela Monty application

get.summary: Get museum zone detail by museum zone Id

put.summary: Update museum zone detail by zone Id

get.summary: Use for get tour by tour ID. For museum owner and visitor

put.summary: Use for accept request tour. For museum owner and visitor

patch.summary: Use to update tour status to paid after visitor paid.

get.summary: For get Ticket Information and use for museum owner role without required museum id

put.summary: For update Ticket Information and use for museum owner role
Update a review of a museum

delete.summary: Delete visitor review for a museum

put.summary: Use for update. For only Visitor
put.description: this endpoint can be use for insert more detail and also update any field. so you dont need to worry about field that dont want to update just leave it empty or null.

get.summary: Use to get museum profile. For only museum owner

put.summary: Use to update museum profile. For only museum owner
Use to update museum payment. For only museum owner

get.summary: Get profile information for admin

put.summary: Use for update. Any field can be null if dont want to update
put.description: this endpoint can be use for insert more detail and also update any field. so you dont need to worry about field that dont want to update just leave it empty or null.

put.summary: For update schedule for any day of a week. For museum owner
put.description: RequestBody is List of object and each object of a day of week so this allowed only 7 object. If List duplicate day the update will update as the latest one.

get.summary: Get event by eventId

put.summary: Update an event by event ID. For museum owner role only

delete.summary: Soft delete an event by updating delete status. For museum owner role only

get.summary: Get museum artifact by artifact Id

put.summary: Update museum artifact by artifact Id

patch.summary: Delete museum artifact by artifact Id

get.summary: Get all museum zone
Get all reviews of a museum

post.summary: Create a review for a museum

get.summary: Get all guide. For museum owner

post.summary: add new guide. For museum owner

get.summary: Visitor add museum as their favorite

post.summary: Visitor add museum as their favorite

get.summary: Get all event of all museums. Can use without authorize
get.description: Use to get all event with pagination

post.summary: Create a new event. For museum owner role only
For RequestTour. Only visitor can use.
For booking a ticket. Only visitor can use.
post.description: Need to input right ticket price and total price
After getting OTP from email, use it to verify account

post.summary: For send re-send otp to verify account
post.description: This endpoint use for send otp to verify account if user request to resend again

post.summary: Use for login for all role
Login with google with IdToken as visitor
post.description: This endpoint need google IdToken from frontend to verify to register or login. Can use google oauth2 playground website to get IdToken for testing.

post.summary: Login with google with IdToken as museum
post.description: This endpoint need google IdToken from frontend to verify to register or login. Can use google oauth2 playground website to get IdToken for testing.
After input email, OTP will send to email. Then use OTP to verify in verify-otp/forgot-password endpoint. NOTE: if you dont see OTP email send in inbox please kinda check in spam.

post.summary: Verify OTP to confirm change password
post.description: Use OTP in email to verify then it will return token. This token can be use to combine with frontend route to make sure the link use to change password can be use only in period of time and nobody can access, accepted user.

post.summary: Reset password after confirm all step of forgot password
post.description: This endpoint use to confirm token and then change password to new password for user

post.summary: Add museum artifact by zone Id

patch.summary: For check and verify booking ticket by bookingId which provide by qr scan. Only museum owner can use.
For check and verify booking ticket by code QR instead of scanning. Only museum owner can use.
For approve request museums. Allowed only admin
Use old password to change password

get.description: For Date must follow format (YYYY-MM-DD). If any filter dont want to use just leave it empty.
